T02D2120:160a-0: @160a ` // 'jam dpa' ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2120:160a-1: thun mong grub rin po che gter sgrub pa /
T02D2120:160b-0: 'jam dpal gyi bsnyen pa gzhung bzhin @160b du byas la /
T02D2120:160b-1: de nas grong khyer chen po'i dbus sam /
T02D2120:160b-2: rgyal po'i pho brang du mandal mda' gang grub bzhi ba byas pa /
T02D2120:160b-3: ba'i rnam lnga dang dri zhim po sna tshogs kyas byugs la /
T02D2120:160b-4: glegs pam gru bzhi pa cig la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la /
T02D2120:160b-6: dzam bha la'i gzugs ser po /
T02D2120:160b-7: gsus pa che ba byin sha rgyas ba rgyan ma lus pas brgyan pa /
T02D2120:160b-8: g-yas pa na b'i dza p'ur ra bsnams pa /
T02D2120:160b-9: g-yon pa na ne'i le'i rgyal pa bsnams pa bum pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2120:160b-10: de'i mdun du gnod sbyin sku mdog ser po rin po che bsnams pa /
T02D2120:160b-11: g-yas su gnod sbyin sku mdog dmar ser bu ma pa bsnams pa /
T02D2120:160b-12: rgyab tu gnod sbyin sku mdog dkar po rin po che thogs pa /
T02D2120:160b-13: g-yon du gnod sbyin sku mdog nag po ral gri thogs pa /
T02D2120:160b-14: shar lhor sku mdog ser skya ral gri bsnams pa /
T02D2120:160b-15: lho nub tu sku mdog smug nag mdung thogs pa /
T02D2120:160b-16: nub byang na sku mdog ser skya rin po che'i khad pa thogs pa /
T02D2120:160b-17: byang shar na sku mdog ser po gri phu ba thogs pa /
T02D2120:160b-18: g-yon thams cad rin po che'i rgyal mtshan thogs pa /
T02D2120:160b-19: dar sna tshogs kyis thod bcings pa'o //
T02D2120:160b-20: yang glegs bam gru bzhi pa cig la padma 'dab
T02D2120:160b-21: ma brgyad pa lte ba la lha mo nor rgyun
T02D2120:160b-22: ma ser mo rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa
T02D2120:160b-23: / g-yas mchog sbyin g-yon 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2120:160b-24: lha mo brgyad kyang gtso mo'i cha lugs can no //
T02D2120:160b-25: de nas mandal gyi khar bum pa nas dang 'bras kyis bkang la gzhag go //
T02D2120:160b-26: de'i khar lha mo'i glegs bam bzhag la /
T02D2120:160b-27: de'i khar dzam bha la'i glegs bam gzhag / glegs
T02D2120:160b-28: bam gnyis kyi bar du rin po che'i ka ba
T02D2120:160b-29: gzugs / de la dgug gzhug legs par byas la
T02D2120:160b-30: bdag 'jam dpal du gsal ba'i thugs ka nas dza:
T02D2120:160b-31: h'um bam ho: 'phros pa me tog lug ru dang
T02D2120:160b-32: gzugs / / dkar gsum mngar gsum gyis mchod la gtor ma sum yar du gtar /
T02D2120:160b-34: de'i mjug la 'khor dang longs spyod dngos grub stsol cig ces bya'o //
T02D2120:160b-35: nyin mo lha mo rnams kyi snying po bzlas te /
T02D2120:160b-36: aom ba sundh'a ri nyee sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:160b-39: aom su da ttyee sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:160b-40: aom a'a r+ya yee sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:160b-41: aom su bha dyee sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:160b-44: aom sa ra sva tyee sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:160b-45: zas sna tshogs kyi gtor mas mchod /
T02D2120:161a-2: aom dzamdha la dza landr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:161a-3: aom ma ni bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:161a-4: aom pu rna bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:161a-5: aom dha na d'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:161a-6: aom bee shra ban'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:161a-7: aom ki li m'a la ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:161a-8: aom bi tsi kunda li ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:161a-9: aom mu khendr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:161a-10: aom tsa rendr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2120:161a-14: 'jam dpal gyi bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i gtor ma la /
T02D2120:161a-15: gnod sbyin pho mo la zla ba gsum du mchod pa na 'dod pa phun sum tshogs so //
T02D2120:161a-18: dkar gsum mngar gsum dang nas dang 'bru sna lnga'i
T02D2120:161a-19: sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas na lha'i longs
T02D2120:161a-21: tho rangs bya ze tsan pho sngags mo sngags zlos pa yin //
T02D2120:161a-22: chu sbyin yang nas yang du btang na longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan no //
T02D2120:161a-23: de yang 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
T02D2120:161a-25: 'di ni rin po che gter gyi sgrub pa'o //
T02D2120:161a-27: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang /
T02D2120:161a-29: thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man
